EmailTemplate.description: Reply to New Product Warranty Request - ILOW process
EmailTemplate.name: Reply to New Product Warranty Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Warranty Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Good day.
We are in receipt of your request for warranty support.
Our process was recently revised, but don’t worry, we have attached a single page document to guide you through any changes.
Please review this file and then reply with your selected option and details as noted below to complete your request.
Options include:
Repair Option
Within <Fill in TAT from matrix> days (Turn around Time) at no charge.
OR
Exchange Option
Exchange unit will ship within 24 hours for expedite fee of $ <Fill in Expedite fee>
Please include a funded PO with your reply if selecting this option.
Honeywell Avionics Protection Program (“HAPP”) may be available:
If HAPP program is available for your product and you elect to enroll in service contract, the expedite fee can be applied towards annual fee.
Please include aircraft platform, serial number, tail, location, and contact details for a quote.
Thank you for your interest in our products!
Best Regards,
Honeywell Order Support Team
